question: Which mutual fund house is to distribute Rs 9,122 cr to Franklin Templeton unitholders?
explanation:
The Supreme Court (SC) recently approved the mechanism proposed by SBI Mutual Fund to distribute Rs 9,122 crore to the Franklin Templeton unitholders.
This distribution mechanism was framed in consultation with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) and Franklin Templeton MF. In April 2020, the Franklin shut down six debt schemes over redemption pressure.
